author: ASFN Admin
title: No. 2 Baylor facing potential huge loss with QB Russell hurt (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,530 No. 2 Baylor facing potential huge loss with QB Russell hurt (Yahoo Sports) Playoff hopeful Baylor is facing a potentially huge loss after staying undefeated, with quarterback Seth Russell set to see a specialist for a fractured bone in his neck. The extent of Russell's injury won't be known until after that visit early this week, but the second-ranked Bears (7-0) will almost certainly be without the top-rated FBS passer for at least some time when headed into their toughest stretch of the season. First and foremost, about his health and then football,'' coach Art Briles said after Russell got hurt in the Bears' 45-27 victory over Iowa State on Saturday.
